name: SORO BORO
description:
SOROBORO

You find yourself in a cursed template, trapped inside a strange time loop. Use your brain and rocket launcher to find your way out!

HOW TO PLAY

Each level has a switch you must hit (with your head) to open the door. Once open, you can proceed through the door. Where you will end up depends on your timing entering the door. (Hint: watch the indicators at the top of the screen for timing).

Have fun!

CONTROLS:

Z: Jump

X: Rockets

LEFT/RIGHT: Walk

DOWN: Enter door
